law.catch_line: Power of promotion board to enter into agreement with Federal Commodity Credit Corporation.
law.text: The promotion board may enter into an agreement with the Federal Commodity Credit Corporation to collect the specified assessment on all soybeans pledged as collateral for a Commodity Credit Corporation price support loan or purchase by the Commodity Credit Corporation under its loan or purchase programs.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 45, sec. 6, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 180, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1986.
